Module downfall
Package net.dragondelve.realm

Class Realm

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dragondelve.downfall.realm.Actor
      • net.dragondelve.downfall.realm.Realm
  • public class Realm
extends Actor
    Realm is a data model class that represents an actor who possesses diplomatic attributes and is capable of having characters in its court.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Realm

        public Realm()
        Default constructor. Does not provide any default values

      • Realm

        public Realm​(java.lang.Integer id,
             java.lang.String name,
             java.lang.Integer treasury,
             javafx.collections.ObservableList<Material> stockpile,
             javafx.collections.ObservableList<Building> ownedBuildings,
             javafx.collections.ObservableList<Tag> tags)
        Parameters:
        id - Unique realm identifier. Should be unique for every save file
        name - A human-readable name of the realm.
        treasury - Amount of money in the treasury.
        stockpile - List of all materials in realm's stockpile
        ownedBuildings - List of all owned buildings
        tags - List of all tags applied to the realm

      • Realm

        public Realm​(java.lang.Integer id,
             java.lang.String name,
             java.lang.Integer treasury,
             javafx.collections.ObservableList<Material> stockpile,
             javafx.collections.ObservableList<Building> ownedBuildings,
             javafx.collections.ObservableList<Tag> tags,
             java.lang.Integer diplomaticReputation,
             java.lang.Integer powerProjection,
             java.lang.Integer legitimacy,
             java.lang.Integer prestige,
             java.lang.Integer infamy,
             java.lang.Double stability,
             java.lang.String realmPathToGFX,
             java.lang.String rulerPathToGFX)
        Parameters:
        id - Unique realm identifier. Should be unique for every save file
        name - A human-readable name of the realm.
        treasury - Amount of money in the treasury.
        stockpile - List of all materials in realm's stockpile
        ownedBuildings - List of all owned buildings
        tags - List of all tags applied to the realm
        diplomaticReputation - a measure of diplomatic reputation of the Realm. Used when taking diplomatic actions.
        powerProjection - a measure of perceived power of the realm. Used when evaluating threats and taking DoW decisions
        legitimacy - a measure of legitimacy of the ruler. Affects unrest.
        prestige - a measure of a ruler's prestige. Expended and gained as a diplomatic resource
        infamy - a measure of the ruler's infamy. Affects unrest, used when taking diplomatic actions.
        stability - a measure of the realm's stability. affects unrest.
        realmPathToGFX - path to the image of a flag/coat of arms that represents the realm.
        rulerPathToGFX - path to the image of a flag/coat of arms that represents the ruling body.
